hitliubo wrote:

> JUnit4 support parameters passing between different test methods or
> even different test cases??

No: JUnit 4 supports running the same tests with multiple sets of test 
data, but Jan Cumps' response is important to recognize: passing data 
from one test to another goes entirely against JUnit's design, and 
indeed, the concept of isolated object tests.
